title: This Month's GTA+ Benefits
headline: This Month's GTA+ Benefits
subtitle: GTA+
content:
In addition to the recurring monthly GTA$500,000 deposited directly into your Maze Bank account, GTA+ Members who've signed up for this month (August 1 - September 4) will also receive:

— The Benefactor Vorschlaghammer (Sedan)
— Access to the Vinewood Club Workshop
— 2X Rewards on Drag and Drift Races
— And more

Through August 31 all GTA+ Members will also receive a bonus GTA$1,000,000.

Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel anytime. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
